CustomField.formula:
IF(OR(
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "SEMA/NEMA"),
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "SEMA/WCMA"),
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "WCMA/NEMA"),
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "NEMA/SEMA"),
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "WCMA/SEMA"),
INCLUDES(Load_Zone__c, "NEMA/WCMA")
) ,TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Check Load Zone" button and lookup customer's address. WCMA = 8 - 10 NEMA = 11 - 12 SEMA = 13 -14
CustomField.label: XXXXX Load Zone Check Needed
